name: Fire Elemental Myrmidon
languages: one language of its creator's choice

traits.name: Illumination
entries: The myrmidon sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light in a 40-foot radius.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The myrmidon's weapon attacks are magical.

traits.name: Water Susceptibility
entries: For every 5 feet the myrmidon moves in 1 foot or more of water, it takes 2 ({@damage 1d4}) cold damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The myrmidon makes three scimitar attacks.

actions.name: Scimitar
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4 damage) slashing damage.

actions.name: Fiery Strikes {@recharge}
entries: The myrmidon uses Multiattack. Each attack that hits deals an extra 5 (1d10 damage) fire damage.
